title: Cyber Security

title: Advanced Technology
details: We are also, the home of niche tech talents and we help our clients source the right candidates for next-gen tech (Open Source, Cloud Technology, Linux, Blockchain, AI, The Internet of Things, Big Data and many more).

title: Sales and Go-To-Market
details: You have developed your technology and have secured it, what next? We help you with your go-to-market strategy by sourcing niche tech sales specialists to take your technology to the market. We help you complete your project life cycle by helping you identify the right tech sales talent.  We cover C-Level & Executive search, New Business, Channel Sales, Post sales, Pre Sales and Product Specialists.
